profile.name: Shuja Ur Rahman
profile.description: Creative technologist, Master coder, API wrangler, JavaScript ninja, PHP wizard, and tech geek. Pursuing MCA at AMU.

sections.title: Develop Innovative Web Applications and Integrate APIs
content: I have developed dynamic web applications, such as the AMU PYQ Papers platform, which allows students to access previous year question papers with a user-friendly interface. This project employs Ajax for seamless frontend-backend communication, enhancing responsiveness and interactivity.

Incorporating APIs into web applications is one of my core strengths. For instance, my 'Currently-Playing on Spotify' project integrates the Spotify API to display the currently playing track in real-time without page reloads.

projects.title: AMU PYQ Papers
projects.description: A dynamic web application for students to access previous year question papers using Ajax for seamless interaction.

projects.title: Currently Playing on Spotify
projects.description: Displays currently playing Spotify track using Ajax, integrated with web pages for real-time music updates.

gallery.content: Last week, I visited Delhi and spent quality time with my loved ones. We indulged in delicious food at a cozy restaurant that had a beautiful ambiance.
